protectionindicator-desc: An extension created for the purpose of adding protection indicators to pages.
protectionindicator-explanation-cascadin: This page is cascading "edit" protected until "$2". The "$1" right is required to "edit" this page.
This page is cascading "move" protected until "$2". The "$1" right is required to "move" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-e: This page is "edit" protected until $2. The "$1" right is required to "edit" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-m: This page is "move" protected until $2. The "$1" right is required to "move" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-c: This page is "create" protected until $2. The "$1" right is required to "create" this page.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-u: This file is "upload" protected until $2. The "$1" right is required to "upload" this file.
protectionindicator-explanation-normal-i: This page is "edit" protected. The "$1" right is required to "edit" this page.
This page is "move" protected. The "$1" right is required to "move" this page.
This page is "create" protected. The "$1" right is required to "create" this page.
This file is "upload" protected. The "$1" right is required to "upload" this file.
protectionindicator-explanation-flaggedr: This page is flaggedrevs protected until $2. The "$1" right is required to review your own edits.
This page is flaggedrevs protected. The "$1" right is required to review your own edits.
